title: Looking for a T-227 Homerun Baker PSA/SGC
author: C-mack

posts.post_title: Looking for a T-227 Homerun Baker PSA/SGC
posts.post_content:
Have some extra money for cards this month and I'd like to pick up a lower graded, centered with no paper lost t227 Homerun Baker if anyone has one I'd love to see it! 

Thanks in advance
